ValidationRule.description: Contractor address will not go through SF approval process (as Building address). This validation rule only applies to Commercial and Residential Claims.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) == 'Assessment', NOT(ISBLANK( Contractor__c)), Contractor_Address_Verified__c <> 'Yes', OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercial_Claim', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Residential_Claim' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Contractor's Address has not been verified
